page.title: 03Whiteley Village-Design
page.content: {Whiteley Village}is built to an octogan design, with roads crossing it. There is a statue of {William {Whiteley}at the centre, and about 360 houses. Most of them are for single people. They only have three real rooms, and are very small but cosy and comfortable. the main room is a living room with the resident's own furniture. It can be divided with a curtain to make a bedroom, but most of the ones we were shown preferred to keep this as one larger room which included a bed settee.There is also a very small kitchen, and a shower and toilet. Most of the people we spoke to liked their cottages, because they were small and easy to look after. Nearly every old person who we visited had photographs of their children and grand-children on display.
